24 #include "bgpstream_filter.h"
25 #include "bgpstream_debug.h"

27 #include <assert.h>
28 #include <inttypes.h>
29 #include <stdio.h>
30 
31 /* allocate memory for a new bgpstream filter */
32 bgpstream_filter_mgr_t *bgpstream_filter_mgr_create() {
33  bgpstream_debug("\tBSF_MGR: create start");
34  bgpstream_filter_mgr_t *bs_filter_mgr = (bgpstream_filter_mgr_t*) malloc(sizeof(bgpstream_filter_mgr_t));
35  if(bs_filter_mgr == NULL) {
36  return NULL; // can't allocate memory
37  }
38  bs_filter_mgr->projects = NULL;
39  bs_filter_mgr->collectors = NULL;
40  bs_filter_mgr->bgp_types = NULL;
41  bs_filter_mgr->time_intervals = NULL;
42  bs_filter_mgr->last_processed_ts = NULL;
43  bs_filter_mgr->rib_period = 0;
44  bgpstream_debug("\tBSF_MGR: create end");
45  return bs_filter_mgr;
46 }
47 
48 void bgpstream_filter_mgr_filter_add(bgpstream_filter_mgr_t *bs_filter_mgr,
49  bgpstream_filter_type_t filter_type,
50  const char* filter_value) {
51  bgpstream_debug("\tBSF_MGR:: add_filter start");
52  if(bs_filter_mgr == NULL) {
53  return; // nothing to customize
54  }
55  // create a new filter structure
56  bgpstream_string_filter_t *f = (bgpstream_string_filter_t*) malloc(sizeof(bgpstream_string_filter_t));
57  if(f == NULL) {
58  bgpstream_debug("\tBSF_MGR:: add_filter malloc failed");
59  bgpstream_log_warn("\tBSF_MGR: can't allocate memory");
60  return;
61  }
62  // copying filter value
63  strcpy(f->value, filter_value);
64  // add filter to the appropriate list
65  switch(filter_type) {
66  case BGPSTREAM_FILTER_TYPE_PROJECT:
67  f->next = bs_filter_mgr->projects;
68  bs_filter_mgr->projects = f;
69  break;
70  case BGPSTREAM_FILTER_TYPE_COLLECTOR:
71  f->next = bs_filter_mgr->collectors;
72  bs_filter_mgr->collectors = f;
73  break;
74  case BGPSTREAM_FILTER_TYPE_RECORD_TYPE:
75  f->next = bs_filter_mgr->bgp_types;
76  bs_filter_mgr->bgp_types = f;
77  break;
78  default:
79  free(f);
80  bgpstream_log_warn("\tBSF_MGR: unknown filter - ignoring");
81  return;
82  }
83  bgpstream_debug("\tBSF_MGR:: add_filter stop");
84 }
85 
86 
87 void bgpstream_filter_mgr_rib_period_filter_add(bgpstream_filter_mgr_t *bs_filter_mgr,
88  uint32_t period)
89 {
90  bgpstream_debug("\tBSF_MGR:: add_filter start");
91  assert(bs_filter_mgr != NULL);
92  if(period != 0 && bs_filter_mgr->last_processed_ts == NULL)
93  {
94  if((bs_filter_mgr->last_processed_ts = kh_init(collector_ts)) == NULL)
95  {
96  bgpstream_log_warn("\tBSF_MGR: can't allocate memory for collectortype map");
97  }
98  }
99  bs_filter_mgr->rib_period = period;
100  bgpstream_debug("\tBSF_MGR:: add_filter end");
101 
102 }
103 
104 
105 void bgpstream_filter_mgr_interval_filter_add(bgpstream_filter_mgr_t *bs_filter_mgr,
106  uint32_t begin_time,
107  uint32_t end_time){
108  bgpstream_debug("\tBSF_MGR:: add_filter start");
109  if(bs_filter_mgr == NULL) {
110  return; // nothing to customize
111  }
112  // create a new filter structure
113  bgpstream_interval_filter_t *f = (bgpstream_interval_filter_t*) malloc(sizeof(bgpstream_interval_filter_t));
114  if(f == NULL) {
115  bgpstream_debug("\tBSF_MGR:: add_filter malloc failed");
116  bgpstream_log_warn("\tBSF_MGR: can't allocate memory");
117  return;
118  }
119  // copying filter values
120  f->begin_time = begin_time;
121  f->end_time = end_time;
122  f->next = bs_filter_mgr->time_intervals;
123  bs_filter_mgr->time_intervals = f;
124 
125  bgpstream_debug("\tBSF_MGR:: add_filter stop");
126 }
127 
128 int bgpstream_filter_mgr_validate(bgpstream_filter_mgr_t *filter_mgr) {
129  bgpstream_interval_filter_t * tif;
130  /* currently we only validate the intervals */
131  if(filter_mgr->time_intervals != NULL) {
132  tif = filter_mgr->time_intervals;
133 
134  while(tif != NULL) {
135  if(tif->begin_time > tif->end_time) {
136  /* invalid interval */
137  fprintf(stderr, "ERROR: Interval %"PRIu32",%"PRIu32" is invalid\n",
138  tif->begin_time, tif->end_time);
139  return -1;
140  }
141 
142  tif = tif->next;
143  }
144  }
145 
146  return 0;
147 }
148 
149 /* destroy the memory allocated for bgpstream filter */
150 void bgpstream_filter_mgr_destroy(bgpstream_filter_mgr_t *bs_filter_mgr) {
151  bgpstream_debug("\tBSF_MGR:: destroy start");
152  if(bs_filter_mgr == NULL) {
153  return; // nothing to destroy
154  }
155  // destroying filters
156  bgpstream_string_filter_t * sf;
157  bgpstream_interval_filter_t * tif;
158  khiter_t k;
159  // projects
160  sf = NULL;
161  while(bs_filter_mgr->projects != NULL) {
162  sf = bs_filter_mgr->projects;
163  bs_filter_mgr->projects = bs_filter_mgr->projects->next;
164  free(sf);
165  }
166  // collectors
167  sf = NULL;
168  while(bs_filter_mgr->collectors != NULL) {
169  sf = bs_filter_mgr->collectors;
170  bs_filter_mgr->collectors = bs_filter_mgr->collectors->next;
171  free(sf);
172  }
173  // bgp_types
174  sf = NULL;
175  while(bs_filter_mgr->bgp_types != NULL) {
176  sf = bs_filter_mgr->bgp_types;
177  bs_filter_mgr->bgp_types = bs_filter_mgr->bgp_types->next;
178  free(sf);
179  }
180  // time_intervals
181  tif = NULL;
182  while(bs_filter_mgr->time_intervals != NULL) {
183  tif = bs_filter_mgr->time_intervals;
184  bs_filter_mgr->time_intervals = bs_filter_mgr->time_intervals->next;
185  free(tif);
186  }
187  // rib/update frequency
188  if(bs_filter_mgr->last_processed_ts != NULL)
189  {
190  for(k=kh_begin(bs_filter_mgr->last_processed_ts); k!=kh_end(bs_filter_mgr->last_processed_ts); ++k)
191  {
192  if(kh_exist(bs_filter_mgr->last_processed_ts,k))
193  {
194  free(kh_key(bs_filter_mgr->last_processed_ts,k));
195  }
196  }
197  kh_destroy(collector_ts, bs_filter_mgr->last_processed_ts);
198  }
199  // free the mgr structure
200  free(bs_filter_mgr);
201  bs_filter_mgr = NULL;
202  bgpstream_debug("\tBSF_MGR:: destroy end");
203 }
